string-array.name: how_to_install_versions
string-array.item: 1. Note that this is currently under development.
2. To install additional versions, follow the bellow steps.
3. Press the download button below, it will redirect you to a download page.
4. From the page, download the required version file.
5. The downloaded file will be in .json format.
6. After you have downloaded the file, click the import button, and select the downloaded file.
7. Importing may take a while, and the app may not be usable while importing.
8. Wait until importing is done. Then restart the app, your new version will be installed.
